channel.title: Gadgets News – Latest Technology News, Mobile News & Updates
channel.description: Latest Gadgets News and Daily updates on Mobile News. Get trending technology news, Smartphones, Games and other tech related updates.

image.title: Gadgets News – Latest Technology News, Mobile News & Updates

item.title: Jabra Elite 7 Pro and Elite 7 Active get Bluetooth Multipoint feature
item.description: Danish audio brand Jabra has announced that the Bluetooth Multipoint feature has been rolled out for Jabra Elite 7 Pro and Elite 7 Active earbuds via a firmware update on the Jabra Sound+ app for both iOS and Android users.

item.title: Elden Ring developer reveals two new game classes
item.description: As the launch day nears by, FromSoftware has unveiled two Elden Ring classes

item.title: Rapoo has launched five new webcams with up to 4K resolution and dual noise cancellation microphones in India, price starts at Rs 3,499
item.description: Expanding its computer and gaming peripheral portfolio, Rapoo has forayed in the webcam market in India. The company has announced five new webcams under the Rapoo C series which includes -- Rapoo C200, Rapoo C260, Rapoo 270L, Rapoo C280 and Rapoo C500.

item.title: Tesla may be planning to have its own app store
item.description: Electric carmaker Tesla could be working on its own app store, much like Apple and Google app stores

item.title: Amazon smartphone and TV upgrade days: Deals on phones and TVs from OnePlus, Samsung, Xiaomi and others
item.description: Amazon has announced the smartphone and TV upgrade days on the occasion of Valentine's Day. The sale is already live and will go on till February 11.

item.title: Vivo may soon launch its first tablet with Snapdragon 870 chipset, 44W fast charging
item.description: Vivo is reportedly gearing up to enter the tablet market with the Vivo Pad. As per various reports, the device will be launched in the first half of 2022.

item.title: Google rolls out these new features with Chrome 99 beta update
item.description: Google has started to roll out Chrome 99 on the beta channel with new improvements and features.

item.title: Explained: How Google uses AI to make search better for you
item.description: Google relies on artificial intelligence (AI) a lot to improve its search engine. In a recent blog post, the company detailed how AI improvements to its Search systems means that they’re constantly getting better at understanding what you’re looking for.

item.title: Reliance JioBook with ARM-based Windows 10 receives hardware approval
item.description: The Reliance laptop, likely to be called the JioBook is back in news. Earlier, the laptop appeared on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) certification website and now a leak about the device has surfaced online. The yet-to-launch laptop from Reliance Jio was recently mentioned in a hardware certification document.

item.title: Dyson V12 Detect Slim vacuum cleaner launched with laser detect technology at Rs 58,900
item.description: Dyson V12 Detect Slim vacuum cleaner is priced at Rs 58,900. It is available online at Dyson.in and Dyson Demo stores. The company offers free next-day delivery along with auto-warranty registration. The vacuum cleaner offers five-stage filtration and is said to capture 99.99% dust particles.

item.title: Boult Audio ProBass Curve X launched with up to 15 hours battery at Rs 999
item.description: Boult Audio has expanded its wireless earphones range in India. The company has launched Boult Audio ProBass Curve X wireless neckband earphones with up to 15 hours battery. The device comes with IPX5 rating and is equipped with Bluetooth version 5.0.

item.title: You may soon be able to add personalised stickers on your PC's wallpaper
item.description: Microsoft is reportedly planning to roll out wallpaper stickers for Windows 11 users. As per a report by WindowsLatest, the tech giant is working on new stickers that will provide users a new way to personalise PCs as per their liking.

item.title: Samsung rolls out Valentine’s Day offers on Galaxy Watch 4: Details inside
item.description: Valentine's Day is round the corner and Samsung has introduced an interesting offer which will help you surprise your beloved on the special day. The smartphone maker has announced offers on Galaxy Watch 4 for Valentine week. To recall, Samsung launched the Galaxy Watch 4 in India in August last year.

item.title: These WhatsApp users can now play voice notes in the background
item.description: At present, voice notes on WhatsApp do not offer background player support and stop playing when a user leaves the chat. With the new update, WhatsApp Desktop beta users will be able to play voice notes in the background.

item.title: Google TV may have a restricted mode to prevent certain adult content from automatically playing
item.description: Restricted mode feature, however, may have some clause attached to it. As per the report, it appears to be effective only on ad-supported free movies and TV shows. The list includes trailers as well. In order to unlock this setting, users will need to use a PIN.

item.title: Apple may skip digital crown on AirPods Max 2, could bring touch control support
item.description: AirPods Max currently comes with the digital crown that allows users to make volume adjustments and control music. Digital crown on AirPods Max is a unique and clever choice. But, Apple AirPods Max 2 with touch controls may make it easier to awake Siri, jump songs, control volume and do more.

item.title: Apple may launch an ‘affordable’ MacBook Pro in 2022
item.description: ​The entry-level MacBook Pro could have the M2 processor, the likely successor to the M1 which launched in November 2020. It also will have ‘lesser’ displays, which means no miniLED and perhaps lower resolution as well.

item.title: Google Chrome users, government has a ‘warning’ for you
item.description: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology’s Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-IN) has issued a warning for all Google Chrome users.

item.title: Garena Free Fire Redeem Codes for February 7: How to redeem daily codes
item.description: Players can also unlock certain steps and gain different reward points using these codes. Since, it is an action - adventure battle royale game so there can be only one winner in the end.

item.title: New GTA game gets confirmed, GTA V gets release date on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S
item.description: While a release window has not even been hinted at by the developer, we expect the developers to take at least one year to complete the game, and that is considering they manage their deadlines well in a pandemic-riven world.
